function SmartURLDetectionPlugin(){const[editor]=useLexicalComposerContext();useEffect(()=>{return editor.registerUpdateListener(_ref2=>{let{editorState,dirtyElements}=_ref2;if(dirtyElements.size===0)return;editorState.read(()=>{const selection=$getSelection();if(!$isRangeSelection(selection))return;const text=selection.getTextContent();// URL regex pattern - matches http/https URLs and www. const urlRegex=/((https?:\/\/[^\s]+)|(www\.[^\s]+\.[^\s]+))/g;const matches=text.match(urlRegex);if(matches&&matches.length>0){// Check if we have unformatted URLs

const displayText=url.length>50?url.substring(0,47)+'...':url;formattedText=formattedText.replace(url,`[${displayText}](${fullUrl})`);}});if(formattedText!==currentText){// Replace the entire selection with formatted text
newSelection.insertText(formattedText);}}});}}});});},[editor]);return null;}// Error boundary component
